entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 14.

entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
